#
# Source files: DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE: edit CMakeListsLocal.txt instead.
#
#

SET (LOCAL_LIBRARY_BASENAME vtkFastMarching)

INCLUDE (${VTKFASTMARCHING_SOURCE_DIR}/cxx/CMakeListsLocal.txt)

# --------------------------------------------------------------------------
# You probably do not need to modify anything below this line

#
# Create the vtkFastMarching C++ library
#
# (Doesn't work here because of a CMake bug)
# ADD_LIBRARY (vtkFastMarching ${LOCAL_MODULE_SRCS})

#
# Create the vtkFastMarching Tcl library
#

IF (VTK_WRAP_TCL AND VTKFASTMARCHING_WRAP_TCL)

  VTK_WRAP_TCL (vtkFastMarchingTCL FastMarchingTCL_SRCS ${LOCAL_MODULE_SRCS})
  ADD_LIBRARY (vtkFastMarchingTCL ${FastMarchingTCL_SRCS})
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFastMarchingTCL 
                         vtkFastMarching
                         vtkIOTCL 
                         vtkGraphicsTCL 
                         vtkImagingTCL 
                         vtkFilteringTCL 
                         vtkCommonTCL
                         ${TCL_LIBRARY})
  IF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFastMarchingTCL vtkHybridTCL)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)

  IF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFastMarchingTCL vtkParallelTCL)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)

  IF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFastMarchingTCL vtkPatentedTCL)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)

  IF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFastMarchingTCL vtkRenderingTCL)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)

ENDIF (VTK_WRAP_TCL AND VTKFASTMARCHING_WRAP_TCL)

#
# Create the vtkFastMarching Python library
#

IF (VTK_WRAP_PYTHON AND VTKFASTMARCHING_WRAP_PYTHON)

  VTK_WRAP_PYTHON (vtkFastMarchingPython FastMarchingPython_SRCS ${LOCAL_MODULE_SRCS})

  IF (APPLE)
    ADD_LIBRARY (vtkFastMarchingPython MODULE ${FastMarchingPython_SRCS})
  ELSE (APPLE)
    ADD_LIBRARY (vtkFastMarchingPython SHARED ${FastMarchingPython_SRCS})
  ENDIF (APPLE)

  IF (WIN32)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFastMarchingPython 
                           vtkFastMarching
                           vtkIOPython
                           vtkGraphicsPython
                           vtkImagingPython
                           vtkFilteringPython
                           vtkCommonPython
                           debug ${PYTHON_DEBUG_LIBRARY} 
                           optimized ${PYTHON_LIBRARY})
  ELSE (WIN32)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFastMarchingPython 
                           vtkFastMarchingPython 
                           vtkIOPython
                           vtkGraphicsPython
                           vtkImagingPython
                           vtkFilteringPython
                           vtkCommonPython
                           ${PYTHON_LIBRARY})
  ENDIF (WIN32)

  IF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFastMarchingPython vtkHybridPython)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)

  IF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFastMarchingPython vtkParallelPython)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)

  IF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFastMarchingPython vtkPatentedPython)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)

  IF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFastMarchingPython vtkRenderingPython)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)

ENDIF (VTK_WRAP_PYTHON AND VTKFASTMARCHING_WRAP_PYTHON)

#
# Create the vtkFastMarching Java library
#

IF (VTK_WRAP_JAVA AND VTKFASTMARCHING_WRAP_JAVA)

  VTK_WRAP_JAVA (vtkFastMarchingJava FastMarchingJava_SRCS ${LOCAL_MODULE_SRCS})
  ADD_LIBRARY (vtkFastMarchingJava SHARED ${FastMarchingJava_SRCS})
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFastMarchingJava 
                         vtkFastMarching
                         vtkIOJava
                         vtkGraphicsJava
                         vtkImagingJava 
                         vtkFilteringJava
                         vtkCommonJava)
  IF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFastMarchingJava vtkHybridJava)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)

  IF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFastMarchingJava vtkParallelJava)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)

  IF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFastMarchingJava vtkPatentedJava)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)

  IF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFastMarchingJava vtkRenderingJava)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)

ENDIF (VTK_WRAP_JAVA AND VTKFASTMARCHING_WRAP_JAVA)

#
# Link to VTK and local
#

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (
  vtkFastMarching
  vtkIO
  vtkGraphics
  vtkImaging 
  vtkFiltering
  vtkCommon
)

IF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFastMarching vtkHybrid)
ENDIF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)

IF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFastMarching vtkParallel)
ENDIF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)

IF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFastMarching vtkPatented)
ENDIF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)

IF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFastMarching vtkRendering)
ENDIF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)
